name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Vincent LOPIANO, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Vincent LOPIANO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted. Mr. Justice Zappala dissents and would address the merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Frederick W. Ulrich, Chief Deputy Public Defender, for appellant.
Julia Feld, Kathy G. Wingert, Deputy Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
592 A.2d 682
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Vincent LOPIANO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 6, 1991.
Decided July 10, 1991.
Frederick W. Ulrich, Chief Deputy Public Defender, for appellant.
Julia Feld, Kathy G. Wingert, Deputy Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
